messages.author: dharcourt
messages.text: Nit: "Notification" is redundant in this file, and "button hover background color" would work better if it spelled out a grammatically correct phrase, so something like kHoveredButtonBackgroundColor would be more readable (at least to me :-).

messages.author: dharcourt
messages.text: Nit: You could use MakeBackground (a static function defined earlier in the file) to make this a bit shorter.

messages.author: Jun Mukai
messages.text:
On 2013/04/02 22:45:28, dharcourt wrote:
> Nit: "Notification" is redundant in this file, and "button hover background
> color" would work better if it spelled out a grammatically correct phrase, so
> something like kHoveredButtonBackgroundColor would be more readable (at least to
> me :-).

Done.

messages.author: Jun Mukai
messages.text:
On 2013/04/02 22:45:28, dharcourt wrote:

> file) to make this a bit shorter.

Done.
